pr_title: TSK-1335: removed last occurences of "HEI" prefix for history events

timeline.bodyText: This should be THI I think
timeline.author: gitgoodjhe

timeline.bodyText: Why did you delete these? Sonarcloud was not happy without those
timeline.author: gitgoodjhe

replies.bodyText: "We never want String constants for Exception messages or logging statements. We prefer to duplicate those messages here because of code readability" from our guidelines
replies.author: mustaphazorgati

timeline.message: TSK-1335: removed last occurences of "HEI" prefix for history events
